com.mlt.desktop.control

Class TablePane

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mlt.desktop.control.Control
      • com.mlt.desktop.control.Pane
        • com.mlt.desktop.control.GridBagPane
          • com.mlt.desktop.control.TablePane

  • public class TablePane
extends GridBagPane
    A table pane contains a table and a status bar. By default, the status bar shows in label "LB-TABLE" the selected row and the total number of rows.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
